name: Sussy Love
description:
You play as Red, a transfer student at Skeld High. With your best friend Green, you love your day to day in this new school with a lovely cast of students. 

This game is a visual novel, a dating sim more specifically. Flirtatious responses to students will give you more “love points” with them. Acquire enough love points and a romantic relationship becomes available. 

Enjoy the demo of our game, more to come soon!
